input:
Determine if the word 'mixture' is used in the same way in the two sentences below.

The mixture of sulphuric acid and water produces heat.

Determine if the word 'wish' is used in the same way in the two sentences below.

Determine if the word 'brother' is used in the same way in the two sentences below.

Determine if the word 'drought' is used in the same way in the two sentences below.

Farmers most affected by the drought hope that there may yet be sufficient rain early in the growing season.

Determine if the word 'experience' is used in the same way in the two sentences below.

Determine if the word 'shtik' is used in the same way in the two sentences below.

Determine if the word 'growth' is used in the same way in the two sentences below.
